about_the_game:
Rico-Jump is and will always be a free game.

With this DLC you get five additional skins for your robot to show off in multiplayer-matches as well as in your home-screen.
  • Green clear metallic skin
  • Blue clear metallic skin
  • Purple clear metallic skin
  • Pink clear metallic skin
  • Silver clear metallic skin

Additionally, by buying this DLC you support the developer of this game, which I highly appreciate. =)
detailed_description:
Rico-Jump is and will always be a free game.

With this DLC you get five additional skins for your robot to show off in multiplayer-matches as well as in your home-screen.

Additionally, by buying this DLC you support the developer of this game, which I highly appreciate. =)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3100X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 460
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Five new skins to show off in multiplayer-matches as well as in your home-screen.
